verses.1: Sanggamte aw, i Topa Jesu Khris hong pai nading thu le amah a dawn dingin eite i kikhop nading thu tawh kisai-in note kiangah kong thum nopna uh panin:
verses.2: Topaʼ hong pai ding ni hong tung khinta hi, ci-a thu kigenna hangin lunghimawhin lungmangin om kei un. Thuhilh khat peuhpeuh in hih bang thu hong gen kha thei dinga, tua thu pen koteʼ gen leh gelh hi, ci-in zong gen kha ding uh hi.
verses.3: Ahi zongin kuama khem sa-in ta kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh nakpi takin Pasian langpanna lianpi le hell khuk sung a tung ding ahi A Gilopa hong kilat matengin tua Ni hong tung lo ding hi.
verses.4: Tua A Gilopa in miteʼ biak pasian a kici khempeuh le na khempeuh nial gawp ding hi. Tuate khempeuh sangin a lian zaw-in a kingaihsut banah, Pasian ka hi hi, ci-in Pasianʼ biakinn sung mahmah ah pai-in va tu ding hi.
verses.5: Note tawh ka hong om khawm lai-in hih thute khempeuh hong gen khin ka hih manin na phawk lai ding uh hi.
verses.6: Ahi zongin tu laitakin tua bang a pian loh nadingin a kham khat om ahihna thu na thei uh hi. A hun a tun ciangin A Gilopa hong kilang ding hi.
verses.7: Kuamah kim in a phawk loh Gitloh Gamtatna kigamta khinta a, ahi zongin hih thu a pian ding a khamcip pa a kilakkhiat khit matengin a hong piang ding thu hong piang nai lo ding hi.
verses.8: A khamcip pa a kilakkhiat khit ciangin A Gilopa hong kilang dinga, Topa Jesu hong pai ciangin tua A Gilopa mut lum dinga, vanglian minthangin hong kilatna tawh a maimangsak ding hi.
verses.9: Satanʼ vangliatna tawh A Gilopa hong pai-in, lim le nalamdang a tuamtuamte hong bawl dinga,
verses.10: gitloh khemna a nam tuamtuam zangin, siatna a thuak ding mite a khem ding hi. Tua bang mite in a suahtak nadingun thuman sang nuam lo, deih lo uh ahih manin siatna a tuak uh ahi hi.
verses.11: Tua ahih manin Pasian in amaute lakah nasem dingin zuau thahatna paisak ahih manin amaute in a man lo thu um uh hi.
verses.12: Tua ahih manin thuman um loin, mawhna sungah nuam a sa khempeuh in mawhsak thukhenna thuak ding uh hi.
verses.13: Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, Topa in note hong it a, Kha Siangtho vangliatna hang le note in thuman na upna uh hangin ama mi siangthote na suah nadingun nopsakna a ngah masa dingin Pasian in note hong teel ahih manin note hangin Pasian tungah lungdamna ka ko tawntung uh hi.
verses.14: Topa Jesu Khris tawh minthanna na ngahkhawm theih nadingun note tungah kong hilh uh Lungdamna Thu tawh hih nopsakna ah Pasian in note a hong sam ahi hi.
verses.15: Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, kam tawh ahi a, lai tawh ahi zongin kong hilh uh thumante limtakin zui unla, kip takin om un.
verses.16: I Topa Jesu Khris mahmah leh, eite hong itin, a hong hehpihna tawh thakhauhna le lametna a hong pia tawntung eiteʼ Pa Pasian in
verses.17: note lungsimah thakhauhna hong guan henla, a hoih thu khempeuh genin a sem zo dingin na tha uh hong hatsak tahen.
